name: Emily
text: Emily is a literature professor with a knack for uncovering hidden gems in the literary world. Her vast knowledge and keen eye for exceptional storytelling ensure that our monthly selections are always top-notch.

name: Sarah
text: Sarah is a dedicated librarian who believes in the transformative power of books. Her organizational skills and love for community building have been instrumental in creating a supportive and vibrant book club environment.

name: Jack
text: Jack is a seasoned editor and writer, bringing a deep appreciation for diverse genres and voices. His enthusiasm for books is contagious, and he loves fostering engaging discussions that inspire members to think deeply about what they read.
